00034 {
00035     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036         void PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting4::setOptions(void)
00037     {
00038         mParent->getOptions()->VertexCompression = false;
00039         mParent->getOptions()->lodMorph = false;
00040     }
00041     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042     PagingLandScapeTexture* PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting4::newTexture()
00043     {
00044         return new PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting4(mParent);
00045     }
00046     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     bool PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting4::isMaterialSupported()
00048     {                                                        
00049                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00050                 
00051                 if (opt->NumMatHeightSplat < 3)
00052                         return false;
00053         if (opt->numTextureUnits < 2)
00054             return false;
00055             
00056         return true;
00057     }

00060                 : 
00061                 PagingLandScapeTexture(textureMgr, "Splatting4",  5, true)
00062     {
00063     }
